name: Visualping
description: Website monitoring service that alerts users when visual or textual changes occur on web pages. Visualping is a simple yet potent website change detection tool 52. It monitors web pages for visual or text changes and sends alerts via email, Slack, or SMS. It is widely used for competitive intelligence, regulatory monitoring, and tracking disparate digital footprints that do not offer RSS feeds or APIs.
